alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:17PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kemper and Neshoba Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Prairie Point to 6 miles north of Edinburg. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Philadelphia and Burnside around 135 PM CDT. Dixon around 140 PM CDT. Tucker, Bethsaida and Neshoba around 150 PM CDT. Union around 155 PM CDT. House around 200 PM CDT. Herbert Springs around 205 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
